ygData.subject: Re: Alliance Victory (Well Almost)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesssss, Soundwave WAS a T3. MUAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! Just kidding, I didn t feel too great about murdering him. Oh, and Drillbit, I didn t object to its power, you

Yesssss, Soundwave WAS a T3. MUAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! Just kidding, I didn't feel 
too great about murdering him.

Oh, and Drillbit, I didn't object to its power, you argued your point and I 
agreed.

::Zardus/Oblitertron/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer::

Oblitertron laughs, continuing after Surge and firing at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike and Reptilica lower altitude, firing their missile launchers at 
Diskus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus fliew after Oblitertron, his comm suddenly coming alive with 
Panzertron's voice.

"Zardus, I'm on the continent," it says, "I'm heading toward the battle."

Zardus slows down, activating his comm to send a transmission to the 
Oblitercons and Bloodystrike and Reptilica. "Go on and take these bots out," 
he says into it, "I've got something to take care off."

With that, he turns around, seeing Desmodus following. He flies toward her, 
setting his comm to her frequency. "I'm going to meet with an ally of mine," 
he says into it, "You can accompany me if you wish."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer looks toward the cave as it detonates, chuckling and shaking his 
head. He couldn't believe that the Predacons had been defeated like that. The 
cave was pretty far away, so the explosion didn't hit the bots around him.

"Allright, let's get back to base," he says to them (I think its Inzola, 
Stranato, and a few others).
